alert.note: Alert for Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Cascades in Lane County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued September 23 at 10:55AM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PDT THURSDAY... The Lane Regional Air Protection Agency has continued an Air Quality Advisory, which is in effect until 11 AM PDT Thursday A Smoke Air Quality Advisory remains in effect for eastern Lane County. The Cedar Creek wildfire burning in the region combined with forecasted conditions will cause air quality to reach unhealthy levels at times through Thursday. Pollutants in smoke can cause burning eyes, runny nose, aggravate heart and lung diseases, and aggravate other serious health problems. Limit outdoor activities and keep children indoors if it is smoky. Please follow medical advice if you have a heart or lung condition. More information about air quality can be found at: www.lrapa.org

area.areaDesc: Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Cascades in Lane County
